|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Broadcom BCM94306MP |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4306;BCM4306KFB, HT0339 P20, 706203 M; |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 4 |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device is an [[Askey RT210W]]. The FCC ID printed on the v1000 unit may be QDS-BRCM1005. The FCC ID of the parent model is H8N-RT210W.
"3028-000192" is silkscreened on the main board. "3017-001200" is silkscreened on the wireless module
The FCC ID printed on later revision v1 models is probably K7SF5D7230-4 (or misprinted as K7SF5D72304). Other sources say this model uses BCM4712.
Models covered by this entry are probably the.. *[[Belkin F5D7230-4 v1000|v1000]] *[[Belkin F5D7130-4 v1010|v1010]] *[[Belkin F5D7230-4 v1110|v1110]] *[[Belkin F5D7230-4 v1111|v1111]] *[[Belkin F5D7130-4 v1112|v1112]] **''Wireless Cable/DSL Gateway Router'' **FCC ID: QDS-BRCM1005 **OUI: 00:30:BD **SSID: belkin54g **Power adapter: '''Leader Electronics''' MT15-5050200-A1 (5V, 2A) *[[Belkin F5D7230-4 v1222de|v1222de]] *[[Belkin F5D7230-4 v1223df|v1223df]] *[[Belkin F5D7230-4 v1223ef|v1223ef]] *[[Belkin F5D7230-4 v1232a|v1232a]]
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.seattlewireless.net/Belkin_F5D7230-4 F5D7230-4 series on SeattleWireless] *[http://www.linux-hacker.net/misc/F5D7230/ Images and info on linux-hacker.net]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|vintmicroreq}}
always use [[dd-wrt:Tftp flash|Tftp flash]]
